summary: A small and simple mod that makes knives and forks temperable.
descriptionHtml:
Allows knives and forks to be temperable at the grinding wheel, all you need is one silver ingot for each weapon.
This is my first mod for Skyrim, if there's any issues, please notify me and i'll try to fix it at my earliest convenience. This mod is too simple, you can make one like this yourself in minutes, but if you're lazy and or have a cracked Skyrim, download this mod instead. Enjoy!

I verify that I am the author of the Nexus Mods and Steam Workshop versions of this mod:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=260449986
author: NBK x TrOjAn
